trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all activity designer components.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para todas as atividades de componentes do designer.

trans-unit.source: This type provides the basic look-and-feel functionality for other activity designers and allows a developer to add additional capabilities to an activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo fornece a funcionalidade de aparência e funcionalidade básica para outros designers de atividade e permite que um desenvolvedor adicionar recursos à superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in order to either display additional interesting information to the user of the activity, create a better on canvas editing experience (for example, using the `ExpressionTextBox` on an `If` activity designer), or to allow contained elements to be edited (again, consider the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Then%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Else%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> activity).
trans-unit.target: Isso normalmente é feito para a exibir informações interessantes adicionais para o usuário da atividade, crie um melhor em tela de experiência de edição (por exemplo, usando o `ExpressionTextBox` em um `If` designer de atividade), ou para permitir que os elementos contidos editado (novamente, considere o <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Then%2A>e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Else%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If>atividade).</xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Else%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.If.Then%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ActivityDesigner inherits from <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement> and primarily adds the default styling, as well as the ability to customize the icon via the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner.Icon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O ActivityDesigner herda de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement>e adiciona principalmente o estilo padrão, bem como a capacidade de personalizar o ícone por meio de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner.Icon%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement>

trans-unit.source: It should be used whenever you are creating a designer for a type which derives from <xref:System.Activities.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve ser usado sempre que você estiver criando um designer para um tipo que deriva de <xref:System.Activities.Activity>.</xref:System.Activities.Activity>

trans-unit.source: When associated with an <xref:System.Activities.Activity> type, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement.ModelItem%2A> property will point to the ModelItem hierarchy describing the instance of that type being edited.
trans-unit.target: Quando associada a um <xref:System.Activities.Activity>tipo, o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement.ModelItem%2A>propriedade apontará para a hierarquia de ModelItem que descreve a instância do tipo que está sendo editado.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowViewElement.ModelItem%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Activity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string “DisplayName” in this overridden method implementation.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a cadeia de caracteres "DisplayName" nesta implementação do método substituído.

trans-unit.source: The string “DisplayName” in this overridden method implementation.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres "DisplayName" nesta implementação do método substituído.

trans-unit.source: Returns the status of the automation item.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o status do item de automação.

trans-unit.source: The status of the automation item.
trans-unit.target: O status do item de automação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon associated with this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ícone associado a esta <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref> that represents the icon associated with this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"> </xref> que representa o ícone associado a esta <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the IconProperty dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência de IconProperty.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Begins the process of applying a template to create an <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processo de aplicação de um modelo para criar um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the processing that occurs when editing annotation.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processamento que ocorre durante a edição de anotação.

trans-unit.source: Begins the processing that occurs when the model item is changed..
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processamento que ocorre quando o item de modelo é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The new item.
trans-unit.target: O novo item.

trans-unit.source: Begins the processing that occurs when any mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processamento que ocorre quando qualquer botão do mouse é liberado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the processing that occurs when an unhandled <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown> attached routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processamento que ocorre quando um sem tratamento <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown>anexado evento roteado atinge um elemento em sua rota que é derivado desta classe.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.
